item.title: Wicked Movie’s Broadway Cameos Were Nearly Very Different, Reveals Director: “Even In The Edit, We Debated it Back & Forth”
item.description: Wicked director Jon M. Chu reveals how the movie's two major Broadway star cameos were changing throughout all stages of the feature's development.

item.title: Everything Confirmed As Canon In The DC Universe
item.description: James Gunn’s DCU reboot has selected certain events from the DCEU timeline to retain as official canon, despite the franchise being rebooted.

item.title: Frank Grillo's New Movie Is Even Wilder Than His DC Debut In Creature Commandos
item.description: Frank Grillo will break into the new DCU with Creature Commandos soon, but before that he'll star in a horror movie that might be even more wild.
